text: École Centrale de Lyon is a graduate school in engineering in France. Ecole Centrale - Lyon It is in a campus of the Écully (East of France). == Degrees == Its different curricula lead to the following French & European degrees : * Ingénieur Centralien de Lyon (Centralien Graduate engineer Master's degree level program) * Masters & PhD (doctorate studies) * Mastères Spécialisés (MS). Education and research are performed mainly in French and English languages. Students from a dozen of nationalities participate to the different classes at École Centrale de Lyon. Most of the 1500 engineering graduate students at École Centrale de Lyon live in residential buildings near the research labs on campus. These are also shared with 6,000 students from EMLYON Business School. The school is member of the French aerospace network France AEROTECH. Elargissement du réseau FRANCE AEROTECH et signature d’une charte de gouvernance == Notable graduates == * Hervé Renaudeau, French aerospace engineer BIOGRAPHIE DE HERVÉ RENAUDEAU == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in France Category:1857 establishments in Europe Category:Organizations based in Lyon Category:1850s establishments in France
title: École Centrale de Lyon
